programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform -odac ;;;realtime audio out ;-iadc ;;;uncomment -iadc if RT audio input is needed too ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o vincr-complex.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 ksmps = 32 nchnls = 2 0dbfs = 1
gaReverbSend init 0
instr 1
iamp = p4 ifreq = p5 aenv linseg 0.0, 0.1*p3, iamp, 0.6*p3, iamp, 0.3*p3, 0.0 aosc poscil aenv, ifreq, 1 vincr gaReverbSend, aosc endin
instr 2 ; global reverb instrument
al, ar reverbsc gaReverbSend, gaReverbSend, 0.85, 12000 outs gaReverbSend+al, gaReverbSend+ar clear gaReverbSend endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore> f1 0 4096 10 1
{ 4 CNT { 8 PARTIAL ; start time duration amplitude frequency i1 [0.5 * $CNT.] [1 + ($CNT * 0.2)] [.04 + (~ * .02)] [800 + (200 * $CNT.) + ($PARTIAL. * 20)] } }
i2 0 6 e </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
